arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَ بِحَقِّ طه وَ الْقُرْآنِ الْعَظِيْمِ
يَا مَنْ يَقْدِرُ عَلَى حَوَائِجِ السَّائِلِيْنَ
يَا مَنْ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِيْ الضَّمِيْرِ
يَا مَنْ لَا يَحْتَاجُ إِلَى التَّفْسِيْرِ
صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ افْعَلْ بِيْ
translation: In the name of Allah the Beneficent, the Merciful
O Allah bless Muhammad and his family
By the truth of Yaseen (a title of the Holy Prophet] and the Quran full of wisdom
And for the sake of Taa-haa (another title of the Holy Prophet] and the great Quran
O He Who is able to fulfill the desires of those ask.
O He Who knows what is in the heart.
O He Who banishes sorrow from the sorrowful.
O He Who dispels grief from those who grieve.
O He Who is merciful to old men.
O He Who provides for infants.
O He Who needs not to be explained.
Send blessings upon Muhammad and his progeny and fulfill for me
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
yā man ya`lamu mā fiḍ ḍamīr
yā man lā yaḥtāju ilat tafsīr
ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammadin waf`al bī
